title: Massachusetts COVID-19 vaccination data and updates
description: View the latest updates about COVID-19 vaccine in Massachusetts.
cleaned_text: Weekly COVID-19 Vaccination Dashboard Updated each Wednesday by 5 p.m. This weekly dashboard features information on COVID-19 vaccine supply distribution, administration, and other data for Massachusetts. Key metrics include: - Number of doses of vaccine shipped and administered - Number of people vaccinated - Vaccine distribution numbers by county - Age and race/ethnicity breakdowns of those receiving vaccines Previous reports, including daily vaccine report, COVID-19 cases in vaccinated individuals, and COVID-19 vaccination dashboard: [Archive of COVID-19 Vaccination Reports](/info-details/archive-of-covid-19-vaccination-reports) Weekly COVID-19 Municipality Vaccination Data Updated each Wednesday by 5 p.m. The weekly data sets include information on individuals vaccinated for COVID-19 by their zip code and city or town of residence. The data includes age, sex and race/ethnicity characteristics of vaccinated individuals. Previous reports, including daily vaccine report, COVID-19 cases in vaccinated individuals, and COVID-19 vaccination dashboard: [Archive of COVID-19 Vaccination Reports](/info-details/archive-of-covid-19-vaccination-reports) Vaccine approval/Emergency Use Authorization Information from the U.S. Food & Drug Administration (FDA): Stay updated [Sign up for COVID-19 and vaccine alerts](https://member.everbridge.net/index/406686158291020/#/signup) - The CDC provides frequent updates on this [Frequently asked questions about COVID-19 vaccines webpage](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/faq.html). Mass.gov quick links - COVID-19 vaccination location and appointment information: [www.mass.gov/CovidVaccine](/CovidVaccine) - Vaccine safety, how it was developed, and how it works [www.mass.gov/CovidVaccineSafety](/covidvaccinesafety) - Frequently asked questions: [www.mass.gov/CovidVaccineFAQ](/CovidVaccineFAQ)
